item.title: Fish shell argparse examples
item.description: Fish shell argparse examples While the documentation is pretty good, it doesn’t have many examples. So I wrote some basic examples for reference. Short/Long flag #!/usr/bin/env fish argparse 'v/version' -- $argv if set -q _flag_version echo 'version 1.0.0' else echo 'no version flag passed' end Result: $ ./argtest.fish -v version 1.0.0 $ ./argtest.fish --version version 1.0.0 $ ./argtest.fish no version flag passed Short/Long parameter #!/usr/bin/env fish argparse 'i/input=' -- $argv if set -q _flag_input echo 'input parameter passed:'$_flag_input else echo 'no input parameter passed' end Result:
